pageTitle: Duni Bulgaria Summer holidays with Balkan Holidays - Balkan Holidays
textBeforeTable: Weather Duni has a regular entertainment programme, theme nights and dance shows. Alternatively, enjoy a drink in any of the resorts bars. Nights Out There is a full excursion programme available from Duni which includes a boat trip to the stunning Ropotamo River; coach trips to Bourgas for some great value shopping and trips to the popular resorts of Nessebar and Sunny Beach. All excursions should be booked locally through your local Representative. Excursions The resort of Duni is the perfect place to try your hand at either windsurfing or sailing (rentals and instruction available) thanks to the beaches breakwater. More experienced surfers or sailors can venture further out to sea to encounter more advanced conditions.
